changeSet.sql: WITH series AS ( SELECT generate_series(1, 2) AS sery ) INSERT INTO roles(role_name, inserted_date_at_utc) SELECT CASE WHEN s.sery = 2 THEN 'User' ELSE 'Admin' END, '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'::TIMESTAMP + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 30) + 1)::INTEGER * INTERVAL '7 day' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 24))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '1 hour' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 60))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '1 minute' + (FLOOR(RANDOM() * 60))::INTEGER * INTERVAL '1 second' FROM series s
